fields.description:
h2. Description
When user has location services off the system is issuing alerts in a rapid fire style and fade off. 

First alert saying:
Location Services disabled
You currently have all location services for this device disabled.If you proceed, you will be asked to confirm whether location services should be reenabled.

Second alert saying:
Turn on location services to determine your location.
with 'settings' and 'cancel' button

h2. Test code
Please find the attached app.js
fields.summary: iOS: System is issuing two alerts in a rapid fire style when location services are off on device

comments.body:
Using the above sample code, I was able to reproduce the above issue when Location Services was disabled from Settings > Privacy > Location Services. 

Tested on:

Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.2.1.201402061120
SDK build: 3.2.0.GA 3.2.1.GA
CLI: 3.2.1
Alloy: 1.3.1
Xcode: 5.0.2
Devices: iphone 5 (7.0.6), iphone 5 (6.1.3), iphone 4s (6.0.1)
